Class Galaxy

java.lang.Object
greenfoot.World
Galaxy
public class Galaxy extends greenfoot.World
The Galaxy class represents the game world in which the Little Prince explores and interacts. It includes asteroids, planets, characters, and other elements.

The Little Prince Simulation

List of features:

  1. User can set values for the number of asteroids exist, amount of clues the little prince can get from removing a baobab tree, the speed of aseroid, and HP per planet.
  2. The little prince can target to the closest palnet, go around a planet, and remove baobab trees to gain clues.
  3. The fox will be randomly generated on RandomPalnet and follow the fox.
  4. When the littl fox follows the little prince, the speed of removing baobabd tree will be twice faster
  5. The end screen will present different texts based on the result of the simulation. The user can choose to restart the simulation and reset the values.
  6. The asteroid can cause harm to the planet and little pricnce by directly hitting them. The explosion caused by an asteroid hitting a planet can also cuase harm to little prince.

Known bug£º

  1. Asteroids sometimes hit the planet without exploding.
  2. After clicking the start button on the title screen, it will take a while to load to the introAnimation.
